Package bt.net

Class BitfieldConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.net.BitfieldConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandshakeHandler

    public class BitfieldConnectionHandler
extends Object
implements HandshakeHandler
    Sends local bitfield to a newly connected remote peer.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • processIncomingHandshake

        public void processIncomingHandshake​(PeerConnection connection,
                                     Handshake peerHandshake)
        Description copied from interface: HandshakeHandler
        Process an incoming handshake, received from a remote peer. Implementations are free to send messages via the provided connection and may choose to close it if some of their expectations about the handshake are not met. Attempt to read from the provided connection will trigger an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Specified by:
        processIncomingHandshake in interface HandshakeHandler

      • processOutgoingHandshake

        public void processOutgoingHandshake​(Handshake handshake)
        Description copied from interface: HandshakeHandler
        Make amendments to an outgoing handshake, that will be sent to a remote peer.
        Specified by:
        processOutgoingHandshake in interface HandshakeHandler
